issues.clause: A security deposit of SGD 2000.00 shall be paid
issues.rationale: Excessive deposits are not industry standard and may be unfair to tenants.
issues.recommendation: Negotiate to reduce deposit to 2 months maximum.

issues.clause: Tenant agrees to allow the Landlord unrestricted access to the premises at all hours
issues.rationale: Tenant privacy is protected by law and industry practice.
issues.recommendation: Ensure entry notice clause is present and reasonable.

issues.clause: The Tenant is responsible for all repairs
issues.rationale: Unlimited repair liability is unfair to tenants.
issues.recommendation: Negotiate a reasonable cap for minor repairs.

issues.clause: Subletting is prohibited unless the Landlord personally profits from it
issues.rationale: Standard practice, but should be clearly stated.

issues.clause: The Agreement shall last for 99 years
issues.rationale: Shorter tenancies may violate HDB/private housing rules.
issues.recommendation: Ensure tenancy period meets minimum legal requirements.

issues.clause: Tenant must perform weekly entertainment for the Landlord without compensation
issues.rationale: Excessive cleaning demands may be unfair.

issues.clause: Any noise complaints made by the Tenant will be considered a violation of this Agreement
issues.rationale: Overly strict guest policies may be unfair.
issues.recommendation: Negotiate for reasonable guest access if needed.

issues.clause: The Landlord reserves the right to use Tenant's room for storage of personal items
issues.rationale: Tenant privacy is protected by law and industry practice.
issues.recommendation: Ensure entry notice clause is present and reasonable.

issues.clause: Tenant shall provide free labor for all landlord's projects
issues.rationale: Excessive cleaning demands may be unfair.

issues.clause: The Tenant must ask permission before breathing loudly within the unit
issues.rationale: Excessive cleaning demands may be unfair.

issues.clause: Any guest visiting the Tenant must pay an entrance fee to the Landlord
issues.rationale: Excessive cleaning demands may be unfair.

issues.clause: Tenant must maintain the apartment temperature strictly within Landlord's comfort range
issues.rationale: Excessive cleaning demands may be unfair.

issues.clause: If the Tenant leaves behind any belongings, they automatically become property of the Landlord
issues.rationale: Excessive cleaning demands may be unfair.

issues.clause: Tenant must display unwavering gratitude towards the Landlord at all times
issues.rationale: Excessive cleaning demands may be unfair.

issues.clause: Renovations or improvements carried out by Tenant become permanent gifts to the Landlord
issues.rationale: Excessive cleaning demands may be unfair.

issues.clause: The Tenant may not question the fairness of any clause in this Agreement
issues.rationale: Excessive cleaning demands may be unfair.

issues.clause: Tenant shall not look directly at the Landlord's personal possessions without prior written consent
issues.rationale: Excessive cleaning demands may be unfair.

issues.clause: The Tenant agrees to pay additional 'Goodwill Rent' whenever the Landlord feels underappreciated
issues.rationale: Excessive cleaning demands may be unfair.

issues.clause: The Landlord is entitled to 50% of all Tenant's lottery winnings, inheritances, or found coins on the street
issues.rationale: Excessive cleaning demands may be unfair.

issues.clause: Tenant must surrender all control of kitchen appliances
issues.rationale: Excessive cleaning demands may be unfair.

issues.clause: Any attempt by the Tenant to move out requires a six-year written notice
issues.rationale: Excessive cleaning demands may be unfair.

issues.clause: The Tenant must water the Landlord's plants and apologize if they wilt, regardless of fault
issues.rationale: Excessive cleaning demands may be unfair.

issues.clause: Tenant is responsible for all noise created by neighbors, nearby construction, or passing airplanes
issues.rationale: Excessive cleaning demands may be unfair.

issues.clause: The Landlord reserves the right to add, remove, or modify any clause in this Agreement at any time without Tenant's knowledge or consent
issues.rationale: Excessive cleaning demands may be unfair.
